sources.title: Delightfully Dangerous
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Delightfully Dangerous (1945) JANE POWELL
sources.description:
Stars: Jane Powell, Ralph Bellamy, Constance Moore
 Director: Arthur Lubin

 A 15-year-old music student is led to believe that her older sister is a big Broadway star, but in truth is a stripper in a tawdry burlesque house!

sources.title: Delightfully Dangerous (1945) Musical, Romance Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Young Sherry Williams dreams of having a singing career, and she idolizes her older sister Josephine, who has gone to New York to perform on the stage. Sherry decides to make a surprise trip to New York to visit Josephine - but what she finds there is not at all what she expected.

Director: Arthur Lubin
Writers: Frank Tashlin, Edward Verdier 
Stars: Ralph Bellamy, Constance Moore, Jane Powell 
Genres: Classics, Musical, Romance

sources.title: Classic Musical Movies English Subtitles
sources.description: English subtitles for classic musical movies.

metadata.Plot: Young Sherry Williams dreams of having a singing career, and she idolizes her older sister Josephine, who has gone to New York to perform on the stage. When Sherry is distraught just before performing at her school, a visiting Broadway producer encourages her by telling her positive things about her sister. Soon afterwards, Sherry decides to make a surprise trip to New York to visit Josephine - but what she finds there is not at all what she expected.
metadata.Writer: Frank Tashlin, Edward Verdier, Irving Phillips
metadata.Actors: Jane Powell, Ralph Bellamy, Constance Moore
